text: Senses Fail is an American post-hardcore band formed in 2001. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Let It Enfold You (2004) * Still Searching (2006) * Life Is Not a Waiting Room (2008) * The Fire (2010) * Renacer (2013) * Pull the Thorns from Your Heart (2015) * If There Is Light, It Will Find You (2018) * Hell Is in Your Head (2022) ==References== ==Other websites== * Website Category:American punk bands Category:Post-hardcore bands Category:Metalcore bands Category:Musical groups from New Jersey Category:Musical groups established in 2001 Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups
title: Senses Fail
